titleStmt.title: His Maiesties most earnest and sincere desire for peace. Expressed in two most gracious messages to the Lords and Commons of Parliament. : The first from Evesham, July 4, 1644. And the second from Tavestock, Sept. 8, 1644. Since the victory over the Earle of Essex.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, and John Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty:,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
